# modernBoot

Advanced Bootstrap Resampling Methods for Statistical Inference

## Overview

`modernBoot` provides modern and efficient bootstrap resampling
techniques for:

- **Confidence Interval Estimation** ‚Äì Multiple bootstrap CI methods
- **Hypothesis Testing** ‚Äì Bootstrap-based statistical tests
- **Model Validation** ‚Äì Cross-validation with bootstrap
- **Robust Statistics** ‚Äì Bootstrap for robust estimators

## Features

‚ú® **Fast Bootstrap Algorithms** - Vectorized operations for speed -
Efficient resampling procedures

üéØ **Multiple CI Methods** - Percentile method - BCa (Bias-Corrected and
Accelerated) - Bootstrap-t method - Studentized bootstrap

## Installation

### From CRAN

install.packages(‚ÄúmodernBoot‚Äù)

text

### From GitHub

devtools::install_github(‚Äúikrakib/modernBoot‚Äù)

text

## Quick Start

library(modernBoot) data \<- rnorm(100, mean = 5, sd = 2) result \<-
boot_ci(data, mean, R = 1000, ci = ‚Äúbca‚Äù) print(result)

text

# Package index

## Bootstrap Confidence Intervals

- [`bs_mean()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/bs_mean.md)
  : Nonparametric Bootstrap Confidence Interval for the Mean
- [`bca_ci()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/bca_ci.md)
  : Bias-Corrected and Accelerated (BCa) Bootstrap Confidence Interval
- [`studentized_ci()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/studentized_ci.md)
  : Studentized Bootstrap Confidence Interval for Quantiles

## Time Series Bootstrap

- [`moving_block_boot()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/moving_block_boot.md)
  : Moving Block Bootstrap for Time Series
- [`stationary_boot()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/stationary_boot.md)
  : Stationary Bootstrap (Politis & Romano)

## Regression Bootstrap

- [`wild_boot_lm()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/wild_boot_lm.md)
  : Wild Bootstrap for Linear Model Coefficients

## Permutation Tests

- [`perm_test_2sample()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/perm_test_2sample.md)
  : Two-Sample Permutation Test
- [`perm_maxT()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/perm_maxT.md)
  : Permutation maxT for Multiple Testing

## Utilities

- [`auto_select_method()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/auto_select_method.md)
  : Automatic Resampling Method Selection
- [`compare_methods_sim()`](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/reference/compare_methods_sim.md)
  : Simulation Study: Compare Bootstrap Methods

# Articles

### Guides

- [Method Selection and Practical
  Examples](https://github.com/ikrakib/modernBoot/articles/method-selection.md):
